title: Legacy client constantly crashing...
body: Since Riot made the new client it feels like they stopped updating the legacy client. It's CONSTANTLY crashing and it never crashed as much before they made the new client. Am I just making false claims or have they really stopped updating the legacy?

replies.body: Rest assured that we are currently still taking care of the legacy client on NA when it comes to updates/patches/and such. If you feel like you've been getting more and more crashes over time, let me know what kind of errors you see and I can do my best to help fix what is causing it ^_^!

Just got back from ANOTHER crash...I honestly find that really hard to believe and I feel like i'm not the only one here with this issue because I have friends who have told me the same thing.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

What kinds of errors are you seeing? Saying your game crashed isn't very descriptive so I don't have much to go on to help. Check out our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) in the meantime, and if that doesn't help let me know what happens when your game crashes.
I'll alt tab in lobby then my client will just stop working and i'm forced to close it.

So it sounds like what's happening is whenever you alt+tab the client becomes unresponsive. If that's the case, this is probably more of a driver or hardware issue than an actual crash. I'd still suggest looking over that Bug Splat guide, but if that didn't help go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that our tech guys can dig a little deeper!
Yo, wtf. I have had 2 bugsplats and 1 crash on the new clients in the past hour in one game. I switched to the old client and just crashed. seriously.. Even lost us 3 inhibs lol fkn joke
